meanings.sent1: The shiftless student never bothered to study for the test.
meanings.sent2: She was often criticized for her shiftless attitude towards work.
meanings.sent3: The shiftless cat preferred lounging in the sun over chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: His shiftless behavior was like a dark cloud hanging over the team.
meanings.sent5: The shiftless employee's desk was always cluttered and disorganized.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of resourcefulness or efficiency.
meanings.sent1: The shiftless mechanic took hours to fix a simple problem.
meanings.sent2: Her shiftless approach to problem-solving often led to delays.
meanings.sent3: The shiftless chef tried to cook dinner without any ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The shiftless clock ticked slowly, always behind the correct time.
meanings.sent5: The shiftless explorer wandered aimlessly in the forest, getting lost.

meanings.definition: Not willing to work or make an effort.
meanings.sent1: The shiftless employee avoided taking on any extra tasks.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his shiftless behavior when it came to assignments.
meanings.sent3: The shiftless gardener let the weeds take over the entire yard.
meanings.sent4: Her shiftless attitude towards chores left the house in disarray.
meanings.sent5: The shiftless student never raised a hand to volunteer in class.
